item.title: HTTP/2 Reverse Proxy using Apache
item.description: This is a short tutorial on how to configure a reverse-proxy using apache, that translates http/1.1 requests into http/2 requests. Imagine you have a server that only supports http/2 but a client that wants to connect to the server supports only http/1.1. In such a case it would be handy to have some kind of mechanism that translates between client and server. A reverse proxy. For this tutorial we are going to configure a Apache web-server on Ubuntu 22.
